references.paper_title: BasicVSR: The search for essential components in video super-resolution and beyond
references.reason: This paper is foundational for real-world video super-resolution, providing a benchmark for comparing various methods and is frequently cited in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Investigating tradeoffs in real-world video super-resolution
references.reason: This paper directly addresses the challenges of real-world video super-resolution, which is the main focus of the target paper.

references.paper_title: Imagen Video: High definition video generation with diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a powerful text-to-video diffusion model that is leveraged in the target paper's methodology.

references.paper_title: Gentron: Diffusion transformers for image and video generation
references.reason: This paper provides another powerful text-to-video diffusion model that is used for comparison in the target paper.
This paper is a significant contribution to the field of video super-resolution, providing a strong baseline method compared against in the target paper.
